communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Michigan Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All police reports associated with the demonstrations that occurred on 02/06/2025 surrounding the "Face of Hate" screening at the Howell Historic Theater
- Internal communications regarding demonstrations at the above event
- Any footage from body cameras or vehicle cameras of the demonstrations or police interactions with demonstrators, including footage of interactions before and after the demonstration

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Cameron Johnson

title: FCC Complaints - 60 Minutes interview with Kamala Harris

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All complaints submitted to the FCC related to an interview with Kamala Harris that aired on 60 Minutes. This interview first aired in October 2024. Please provided all complaints submitted and received by this agency, including but not limited to all those sent to your agency in accordance with the direction found here: https://consumercomplaints.fcc.gov/hc/en-us/articles/34983255050644-Interested-in-adding-your-comments-to-the-proceeding-investigating-news-distortion-in-the-airing-of-a-60-Minutes-interview-with-then-Vice-President-Kamala-Harris-Learn-more-here.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Beryl Lipton

title: 2024-2025 NBC Sports Bay Area FCC Complaints

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All of the complaints filed toward the TV station NBC Sports Bay Area & California from January 1, 2024, through February 24, 2025.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Archie Smith

communications.subject: North Carolina Public Records Law Request: Jerry Dale Case Videos
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the North Carolina Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all video recordings in the Jerry Dale case pertaining to the murder of Kim Medlin. 
Any interrogation audio or video recordings along with any 911 calls pertaining to the case.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Brandy L. Grace

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Jessie Dotson Video Interrogation Tapes
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All video from Jessie Dotson’s interrogation to include crime scene video evidence and any other video recordings from the case.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Brandy L. Grace.
